Rulings.Base:
1. This effect is mandatory if you control a face-up 'Six Samurai' monster.
2. This effect is applied even if you don't control a 'Six Samurai' monster when it resolves.
3. If "Shien's Advisor" is flipped face-down, its effect is not reapplied if it is flipped face-up again.
4. If you Normal Summon a second "Shien's Advisor" you can declare the same Monster Type as you did with the first one.
5. If "Skill Drain" is activated, the effect of "Shien's Advisor" no longer applies and will not reapply if "Skill Drain" leaves the field.
